attributes.action: LAWS NEEDED TO STOP GARDEN FIRES WHICH CAUSE MANY ISSUES INCLUDING ASTHMA ISSUES.
attributes.additional_details:
WE THE UNDERSIGNED WANT LAWS TO `PROTECT` FROM `GARDEN FIRES` WHICH CAUSE MANY ISSUES AS FOLLOWS AND GOES AGAINST THE CLEAN AIR ACT, `ASTHMA` WHICH MANY HAVE THESE DAYS COULD AND DO GET SERIOUS ATTACKS WHICH CAN KILL, COMMON SENSE.
`ANTI-SOCIAL` THIS PRACTICE IS JUST THAT TO OTHERS, SMOKE DAMAGED WASHING, STOPPING PEOPLE FROM ENJOYING THERE GARDEN, COVERING OVER `AIR VENTS` TO STOP THE SMOKE.
IN THIS DAY AND AGE WHERE COUNCILS ARE TRYING TO GET PEOPLE TO `RECYCLE` IT MAKES SENSE TO DO SO THAN `CREATE POOR AIR`THE AIR SHOULD BE AS CLEAN AS IT CAN BE FOR HEALTH REASONS.

IT DOES NOT MAKE SENSE FOR GOVERNMENT TO WASTE MONEY DOING ONLY PART OF THE JOB, GET YOUR ACT TOGETHER PLEASE.
